entities.description: Usage pattern of prescription tranquilizers to achieve desired effects.
Use of more prescription tranquilizers to achieve the same effect as previously achieved with less.
Reduced effect of the same amount of prescription tranquilizers compared to past usage.
Attempt to reduce or stop the usage of prescription tranquilizers in the past 12 months.
Failure to reduce or stop the usage of prescription tranquilizers after multiple attempts.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent's usage pattern of prescription tranquilizers.
Relates the usage of prescription tranquilizers to increased dosage to achieve desired effects.
Indicates the reduced effect of the same amount of prescription tranquilizers.
Relates to any attempts made by the respondent to cut down or stop using prescription tranquilizers.
Indicates the failure to reduce or stop usage of prescription tranquilizers after multiple attempts.

triplets.subject: Respondent
triplets.object: Reduced Effect from same amount of Prescription Tranquilizers

triplets.subject: Respondent
triplets.object: to Cut Down/Stop Prescription Tranquilizers multiple times
